name: GetPlayerDistanceFromPoint
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3c R3 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Calculate the distance between a player and a map coordinate.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to calculate the distance from.

return_values: The distance between the player and the point as a float.
